name: Appease the Gods VR
description:
Find your way into heaven by appeasing Gods the way they like to be appeased. All assets in this game have been crafted using Google Blocks & Tiltbrush.  "Appease the Gods" was unanimously chosen as the winner of the  48 hour BRLN XR ART JAM. 

Interaction instructions: Use the grip button to grab objects.

(If you are unable to solve the mechanical puzzle, tapping spacebar twice will bring you salvation)

This was developed for HTC Vive, but should work on the Oculus.
